body: The first story was actually pretty good

I see, the sister from first story deeply in love with her brother, she tried to forget him through marriage but quickly divorce and become depressed, lil bro come and make her cheerful again.. so the sister try to keep lil bro close to her.. this implied by her action that get angry when lil bro have doujin books, she really treasure her brother the most.. 
11/10
I got some complicated thought about this tankoubon. especially the last story. it should be good development but it kinda ruined coz everything can be solve with sex. :(

jazzboy--not everyone can reach this lvl of writing in hentai

Agree With U
